AutoScalingGroupName.description: The name or ARN of the Auto Scaling group.

Granularity.description: The granularity to associate with the metrics to collect. The only valid value is 1Minute.

Metrics.description: One or more of the following metrics. If you omit this parameter, all metrics are enabled.    GroupMinSize     GroupMaxSize     GroupDesiredCapacity     GroupInServiceInstances     GroupPendingInstances     GroupStandbyInstances     GroupTerminatingInstances     GroupTotalInstances
